## plot2!!!!
```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"
ds2 <- read_rds("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobbyjy/MyData/main/pinot.rds")

a<-ds2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(price,points))+
  geom_point()

ggplotly(a)
```
